---
title: BoxyHQ SSO and Ory Network
sidebar_label: Ory Network
---

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_58cfcc64

segments.source_content: # Ory Network

translations.zh-CN: # Ory Network

segments.source_content: [Ory Network](https://www.ory.sh/network/) is a fully hosted identity infrastructure for scaling teams. Based on open standards and supported by a team of security experts, it’s the fastest way to build secure auth flows.

translations.zh-CN: [Ory Network](https://www.ory.sh/network/) 是一个完全托管的身份基础设施平台，专为成长型团队设计。基于开放标准并由安全专家团队支持，是构建安全认证流程的最快方式。

segments.source_content: We integrate with Ory Network to support SAML SSO. You can follow the step outlined below:

translations.zh-CN: 我们与Ory Network集成以支持SAML单点登录。您可以按照以下步骤操作：

segments.source_content: ## Deployment Options

translations.zh-CN: ## 部署选项

segments.source_content: The easiest way to use the integration is to signup for a 30 day trial on our [SaaS solution](https://app.eu.boxyhq.com/auth/join). If you'd like to self-host (The Ory integration is an Enterprise Edition feature) please [reach out](mailto:support@boxyhq.com) to us to obtain an evaluation license.

translations.zh-CN: 最简单的集成方式是注册使用我们[SaaS解决方案](https://app.eu.boxyhq.com/auth/join)的30天试用版。如需自托管（Ory集成是企业版功能），请[联系我们](mailto:support@boxyhq.com)获取评估许可证。

segments.source_content: Please note that we utilize the `B2B Organizations` feature of Ory Network which requires the Growth plan or higher with Ory.

translations.zh-CN: 请注意，我们使用了Ory Network的"B2B组织"功能，这需要Growth或更高等级的Ory订阅方案。

segments.source_content: ## Obtain the Ory Network Session Token

translations.zh-CN: ## 获取Ory Network会话令牌

segments.source_content: Install the [Ory CLI](https://www.ory.sh/docs/guides/cli/installation) and then run `ory auth` to sign into your Ory Network account.

translations.zh-CN: 安装[Ory CLI](https://www.ory.sh/docs/guides/cli/installation)后运行`ory auth`命令登录您的Ory Network账户。

segments.source_content: You will find the `session_token` in the `.ory-cloud.json` file in your home folder. Copy that out since you need this for the next step. The `session_token` starts with `ory_st` prefix.

translations.zh-CN: 您可以在用户主目录的`.ory-cloud.json`文件中找到以`ory_st`为前缀的`session_token`会话令牌，复制该令牌用于后续步骤。

segments.source_content: You will also need your Project ID which can be obtained from your Ory account.

translations.zh-CN: 同时需要从Ory账户中获取您的项目ID。

segments.source_content: ![Ory Project ID](./ory/ory-projectid.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![Ory项目ID](./ory/ory-projectid.png)

segments.source_content: ## Configure the Ory Session Token and Project ID

translations.zh-CN: ## 配置Ory会话令牌和项目ID

segments.source_content: Log into your BoxyHQ account and create a new `Product` if you don't already have one. Our concept of `Product` is similar to Ory's `Project`.

translations.zh-CN: 登录您的BoxyHQ账户，如尚未创建请新建一个"产品"（Product）。我们的"产品"概念与Ory的"项目"（Project）类似。

segments.source_content: Navigate to `Settings` in the sidebar and then the `Ory Integration` tab. Paste your session token and Project ID in the input fields and click the Save button.

translations.zh-CN: 在侧边栏导航至"设置"→"Ory集成"标签页，将会话令牌和项目ID粘贴至输入框后点击保存按钮。

segments.source_content: ![Ory and BoxyHQ Integration](./ory/ory-integration-ui.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![Ory与BoxyHQ集成界面](./ory/ory-integration-ui.png)

segments.source_content: If you are self-hosting, you have to set these [environment variables](https://boxyhq.com/docs/jackson/deploy/env-variables#enterprise-features---ory-integration)

translations.zh-CN: 若采用自托管方案，需设置这些[环境变量](https://boxyhq.com/docs/jackson/deploy/env-variables#enterprise-features---ory-integration)

segments.source_content: ## Integration explained

translations.zh-CN: ## 集成原理说明

segments.source_content: Now whenever you [create a new SSO connection on BoxyHQ](https://boxyhq.com/guides/jackson/configuring-saml-sso) it automatically calls Ory APIs to setup a new Organization and a Generic OIDC connection. All the user management still flows through Ory Network. Please remember to use the domain as the `tenant` in BoxyHQ.

translations.zh-CN: 当您在BoxyHQ上[创建新的SSO连接](https://boxyhq.com/guides/jackson/configuring-saml-sso)时，系统会自动调用Ory API创建新组织和通用OIDC连接。所有用户管理仍通过Ory Network完成，请务必使用域名作为BoxyHQ中的"租户"（tenant）。

segments.source_content: ![Ory Organization](./ory/ory-organization.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![Ory组织架构](./ory/ory-organization.png)

segments.source_content: ![Ory Organization Details](./ory/ory-organization-details.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![Ory组织详情](./ory/ory-organization-details.png)

segments.source_content: If you now navigate to your Ory Account Experience UI and enter an email associated with the domain you just configured then the `Sign in with SSO` button appears.

translations.zh-CN: 此时访问Ory账户体验界面，输入已配置域名关联的邮箱后，将会出现"通过SSO登录"按钮。

segments.source_content: ![Ory Organization Details](./ory/ory-account-experience.png)

translations.zh-CN: ![Ory账户体验界面](./ory/ory-account-experience.png)

segments.source_content: ## Next steps

translations.zh-CN: ## 后续步骤

segments.source_content: - If you need any help with the integration or have any questions then please [Contact us](mailto:support@boxyhq.com)

translations.zh-CN: - 如需集成协助或有任何疑问，请[联系我们](mailto:support@boxyhq.com)
